software.leonov.cells.fluent

Class FWorkbook

  • java.lang.Object
    • software.leonov.cells.fluent.FWorkbook
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<FSheet>

    public final class FWorkbook
extends Object
implements Iterable<FSheet>
    High level representation of a Microsoft Excel workbook.
    Author:
    Zhenya Leonov

      • newWorkbook

        public static FWorkbook newWorkbook(WorkbookFormat format)
        Creates a new workbook with an empty sheet.

        Workbooks can be created in the classic Excel Binary File Format xls format or the Office Open XML xlsx format.

        Streaming Office Open XML workbooks will be created using the default settings. See SXSSFWorkbook and new SXSSFWorkbook(XSSFWorkbook) for more information.

        Parameters:
        format - specifies which workbook format to use
        Returns:
        a new workbook with an empty sheet

      • newWorkbook

        public static FWorkbook newWorkbook(WorkbookFormat format,
                                    int nsheets)
        Creates a new workbook and adds the specified number of empty sheets.

        Workbooks can be created in the classic Excel Binary File Format xls format or the Office Open XML xlsx format.

        Streaming Office Open XML workbooks will be created using the default settings. See SXSSFWorkbook and new SXSSFWorkbook(XSSFWorkbook) for more information.

        Parameters:
        format - specifies which workbook format to use
        nsheets - the number of sheets to create in the workbook
        Returns:
        a new workbook containing the specified number of empty sheets named Sheet1, Sheet2, Sheet3, etc...

      • dispose

        public boolean dispose()

      • getFileExtension

        public String getFileExtension()

      • getOrCreateActiveSheet

        public FSheet getOrCreateActiveSheet()
        Returns the active sheet in this workbook.

        The active sheet is the sheet which is displayed when a Microsoft Excel workbook is opened.

        If this workbook does not contain any sheets then Sheet1 will be created.

        Returns:
        the active sheet in this workbook

      • getOrCreateFirstSheet

        public FSheet getOrCreateFirstSheet()
        Returns the first sheet in this workbook.

        If this workbook does not contain any sheets then Sheet1 will be created.

        Returns:
        the first sheet in this workbook

      • getOrCreateSheet

        public FSheet getOrCreateSheet(int index)
        Returns the specified sheet in this workbook. If the number of sheets is less than the given index then new sheets will be created until the specified index is reached.
        Parameters:
        index - the 0-based index of the sheet to return
        Returns:
        the specified sheet in this workbook

      • getOrCreateSheet

        public FSheet getOrCreateSheet(String name)
        Returns the specified sheet in this workbook. If the sheet does not exist it will be created.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the sheet
        Returns:
        the specified sheet in this workbook

      • getSheet

        public FSheet getSheet(int index)
        Returns the specified sheet in this workbook or null if the number of sheets in the workbook is less than index.
        Parameters:
        index - the 0-based index of the sheet to return
        Returns:
        the specified sheet in this workbook or null

      • getSheet

        public FSheet getSheet(String name)
        Returns the specified sheet in this workbook or null if the sheet does not exist.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the sheet
        Returns:
        the specified sheet in this workbook or null
